wikipedia_page.main: Major General Sir Christopher John Airy,  (born 8 March 1934) is a retired British Army officer who served as General Officer Commanding the London District and Major-General commanding the Household Division from 1986 to 1989.

response: *Major-General Sir Christopher Airy,  1986–1989 late Scots Guards
